attributes.action: Improve Appeals Process For The Motorist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently if you are pulled over by the Police with a supposed motorist offense you are instantly fined and given a fixed 3 Points on your License.

If you attempt to appeal against the offence the process is  totally unfair as you risk having your fine doubled and further incur costs for the appeal.

The appeals process should be fair with no increase to the fine.  Costs incurred for the appeal should be passed to the losing party.  The system should work both ways.
